title: Ghost of a Chance
description: Once, he'd almost been her loverAsking a favor of Julian Aries wouldn't be easy, Anne Silver knew. Months earlier they'd parted on no uncertain terms. Now she fervently needed the handsome ex-agent's help to trap some fake psychic investigators.Grudgingly, Julian listened to her plan - and promptly took complete charge, much to Anne's chagrin. Working side by side, the specter of desire rose once more between them. Anne found herself haunted by ghosts, both real and imaginary...and a love that had never died...
author: Jayne Ann Krentz
